title: Playwright MCP Tool Schemas
description: Comprehensive JSON Schema definitions for all Playwright MCP server tools

selector.description: CSS selector, XPath, or text selector

playwright_goto_frame.description: Switch to a specific frame or iframe

url.description: URL to open in the new tab

tabId.description: Tab ID to close, or omit to close current tab

force.description: Force click even if element is not actionable

playwright_type.description: Type text into an element (with key events)

playwright_fill.description: Fill an input element (fast, no key events)

playwright_press.description: Press a keyboard key or key combination

key.description: Key to press (e.g., Enter, Tab, ArrowDown)

playwright_check.description: Check a checkbox or radio button

playwright_drag_drop.description: Drag an element and drop it on another element

playwright_upload.description: Upload file(s) to a file input

playwright_scroll.description: Scroll the page or an element

selector.description: Element selector to scroll, or omit to scroll the page

playwright_get_text.description: Get text content of an element

innerText.description: Get innerText (visible text) vs textContent (all text)

playwright_get_attribute.description: Get an attribute value from an element

playwright_get_value.description: Get the value of an input element

playwright_get_inner_html.description: Get the innerHTML of an element

playwright_get_outer_html.description: Get the outerHTML of an element

selector.description: Element selector to screenshot, or omit for full page

playwright_pdf.description: Generate a PDF of the page

playwright_get_table.description: Extract data from an HTML table

playwright_evaluate.description: Execute JavaScript in the page context

args.description: Arguments to pass to the script

names.description: Cookie names to delete, or omit to delete all

playwright_save_session.description: Save browser session state (cookies, localStorage, sessionStorage)

path.description: File path to save session state

playwright_restore_session.description: Restore browser session state from file

path.description: File path to restore session from

playwright_new_context.description: Create a new browser context (isolated session)

pattern.description: URL pattern to intercept (glob or regex)

playwright_wait_for_request.description: Wait for a network request matching pattern

playwright_wait_for_response.description: Wait for a network response matching pattern

playwright_get_har.description: Get HTTP Archive (HAR) of network activity

playwright_set_extra_headers.description: Set extra HTTP headers for all requests

playwright_find_element.description: Find a single element matching selector

playwright_wait_for_selector.description: Wait for an element to reach a specific state

playwright_is_visible.description: Check if an element is visible

playwright_is_enabled.description: Check if an element is enabled
